name: C-08 Document API behaviour when depositpaid is sent as an integer instead of a boolean

statusDetails.message:
[Expected HTTP 409 but got 201.
Response body:
{
    "bookingid": 7,
    "roomid": 55,
    "firstname": "John",
    "lastname": "Doe",
    "depositpaid": true,
    "bookingdates": {
        "checkin": "2026-04-08",
        "checkout": "2026-04-12"
    }
}] 
expected: 409
 but was: 201
statusDetails.trace:

description:
As an API consumer
  I want to create hotel room bookings
  So that guests can reserve rooms with their details

steps.name: Given the booking API is running
When I create a booking with depositpaid as integer value 1 and all other fields valid
Then the response status code should be 409
